name: Truffles and Tribulations
description:
Package chocolates, ship them off, sabotage your friends.

1 - 4 Players (The more the better)

THIS GAME REQUIRES ONE OR MORE GAME PADS

Controls:

    Move: Left Stick
    Pickup/Drop: X
    Jump: A
    Further details are provided in a quick tutorial

This game was made for the 2019 Winter UE4Jam
